item.title: CVE-2024-32533|2024-04-17T08:45:16.631Z -- peter%20shaw -- lh%20add%20media%20from%20url
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Peter Shaw LH Add Media From Url allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects LH Add Media From Url: from n/a through 1.22.
